entries.description: Patch cilium v1.12 and v1.11 to latest patch releases (v1.12.9) (v1.11.16).
Update kube-state-metrics to v2.5.0 and node-exporter to v1.4.0.
Add a dedicated service account for CSI snapshot webhook server (Openstack).
Do not override floating IP settings from user input for OpenStack initial MD.
Do not try to watch `Cluster` resources on the master in `usersshkey-synchronizer` and use Seeds as correct source instead.
Fix a bug that lead to metering reports overwriting each other when used with multiple seeds. Report names now include seed name prefixes.
Fix MLA stack constantly updating Grafana datasources.
The MLA stack is now able to recover from a lost Grafana volume, properly recreating organizations for KKP projects.
Initialize Machine Deployments without waiting for all cluster details to finish loading.
